description: This file initializes an agent with specific tools and a model, then requests a report comparing two stocks.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: Represents an agent configured with a model and tools to perform tasks.

classes.name: AzureOpenAI
classes.description: Represents an Azure OpenAI model used by the agent.

classes.name: YFinanceTools
classes.description: Tools for fetching financial data from Yahoo Finance.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Outputs the agent's response, optionally streaming the output.
